title: Two Covid vaccines for young children show good response in early trial: Study
author: PTI
description: Both vaccines elicited high magnitude of IgG neutralising antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 and spike protein-specific T cell responses.The strong neutralising antibody response elicited by the vaccines in 16 baby rhesus macaques persisted for 22 weeks
cleaned_text: 04:47 PM IST] Two Covid vaccines for young children show good response in early trial: Study Both vaccines elicited high magnitude of IgG neutralising antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 and spike protein-specific T cell responses The strong neutralising antibody response elicited by the vaccines in 16 baby rhesus macaques persisted for 22 weeks [] The Moderna Covid-19 vaccine and an experimental protein-based preventive proved to be safe and showed good antibody response against SARS-CoV-2 in a trial on baby rhesus macaques, scientists say.
